## Description {#details}

Represents any type of generic load or store.

G&#95;LOAD, G&#95;STORE, G&#95;ZEXTLOAD, G&#95;SEXTLOAD.

Definition at line 81 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h">GenericMachineInstrs.h</a>.
